entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Watrous
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:23 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Watrous 08:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
